item.title: Suggested Edit
item.content:encoded:
Wouldn't it be prudent to put some of the information from this discussion on the main page of the article? Reading the actual entry for this jutsu, both myself (a fairly new player) and a more seasoned player were under the impression that absolutely no jutsu would function, but since I was at a place where testing it wouldn't seriously inconvenience me, I went ahead and tried.

It'd be most helpful for those players grinding for experience, Ally drops, etc. to know that Jutsu with a Chakra Cost of zero can still be used; even Jutsu that have fractional Chakra costs e.g. that cost nothing normally but have a cost as a Wasteland mission due to the multiplier. I realize it is mentioned here and as the final bullet point at the beginning of the Jutsu article, but this is very easy to miss even when searching for the information.
